name: WebSearch MCP - Docker Integration
description: Docker-based MCP client configuration for WebSearch service

tools.name: web_search
tools.description: Search the web using SearXNG metasearch engine with support for multiple engines and categories

parameters.max_results: Maximum number of results to return (default: 10)
parameters.categories: Search categories: general, images, videos, news, files, science (default: general)
parameters.time_range: Optional time filter: day, week, month, year

tools.name: fetch_content
tools.description: Extract readable content from a URL with intelligent text extraction

parameters.use_javascript: Enable JavaScript rendering for dynamic content (default: false)
parameters.extract_images: Include image URLs in extraction (default: false)

tools.name: batch_fetch
tools.description: Extract content from multiple URLs concurrently with rate limiting

tools.name: get_session_info
tools.description: Get current MCP session statistics and information

tools.name: clear_cache
tools.description: Clear Redis cache with optional pattern matching

parameters.pattern: Optional cache key pattern to match (default: clears all)

tools.name: health_check
tools.description: Check health status of all WebSearch MCP services
